text: The 2015 Weber State Wildcats football team represented Weber State University in the 2015 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Wildcats were led by second year head coach Jay Hill, played their games at Stewart Stadium and were members of the Big Sky Conference. They finished the season 6–5, 5–3 in Big Sky play to finish in a four way tie for fourth place. ==Schedule== Despite also being a member of the Big Sky Conference, the game with Sacramento State on September 19 is considered a non conference game. ==Game summaries== ===at Oregon State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" !
